sentences.en: A short thick neck, or a ewe neck, should be penalized.
sentences.cn: 短而粗的脖子或羊脖子属于缺陷.

sentences.en: Abraham set apart seven ewe lambs from the flock.
sentences.cn: 亚伯拉罕把七只母羊羔另放在一处.

sentences.en: And Abraham set seven ewe lambs of the flock by themselves.
sentences.cn: 28亚伯拉罕把七只母羊羔另放在一处.

sentences.en: Antitumor activity of the aquatic extract the root of Euphorbia helioscopia L ( EWE ) in Vitro were studied.
sentences.cn: 本文研究了泽漆根水提取液 ( EWE ) 的体外抗肿瘤作用.

sentences.en: As soon goes the young lamb's skin to the market as the old ewe's.
sentences.cn: 老羊皮上市,小羊皮也跟着来.

sentences.en: But the poor man had nothing but one small ewe lamb, which he had bought.
sentences.cn: 3穷人除了所买来养活的一只小母羊羔之外, 别无所有.

sentences.en: Is milk row lead effect better than ewe's milk?
sentences.cn: 牛奶排铅效果比羊奶好?牛奶排铅效果比羊奶好?

sentences.en: It is made from's , cow's or ewe's milk.
sentences.cn: 它是用马奶 、 牛奶或羊奶做的.

sentences.en: It is probably quite unpleasant for the ewe, too.
sentences.cn: 而且,这可能也会令母羊感到相当不适.

sentences.en: It's made from mare s, cow s or ewe s milk.
sentences.cn: 它是用马奶 、 牛奶或羊奶做成.

sentences.en: Little Mary was her ewe lamb.
sentences.cn: 小玛丽是她的掌上明珠.

sentences.en: On one occasion, two eagles were trying to take a lamb from its mother and were struggling. A third eagle came in to distract the ewe and one of the others got the lamb.
sentences.cn: 有可能情况是这样的，两只金雕试图从母羊手里夺走小羊羔，相持不下，第三只雕飞来转移了母羊的注意力，后来前面两只中的一只抓走了羊羔。

sentences.en: The first mating of ewe is 10～12 month and average lambing rate is 111 36 %.
sentences.cn: 母羊初配年龄为10～12月龄,平均产羔率为11136%.

sentences.en: The group of sheep is lead by a strong ewe.
sentences.cn: 羊群由一只强壮的母羊带领着.

sentences.en: The idiom'one's ewe lamb'fell from the Bible . One's ewe lamb.
sentences.cn: (最珍爱的东西)这个成语出自《圣经》.

sentences.en: The resulting hybrid was grown into a tiny embryo known as a blastocyst, implanted into the womb of a surrogate mother, and went on to become Dolly, the world's most famous ewe.
sentences.cn: 杂交后的细胞渐渐成长为一个小小的叫做胚泡的胚胎，被植入代孕母亲的子宫，然后就变成了多莉——世界最著名的母羊。

sentences.en: Then Abraham set seven ewe lambs of the flock by themselves.
sentences.cn: 创21:28亚伯拉罕把七只母羊羔另放在一处.
